articles.title: Hubble peers into globular cluster NGC 6325 - Phys.org
articles.description: The densely packed globular cluster NGC 6325 glistens in this image from the NASA/ESA Hubble Space Telescope. This concentrated group of stars lies around 26,000 light-years from Earth in the constellation Ophiuchus.
